translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふふはははは！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Fufuhahaha!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中々しぶとい汚れではないか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're quite a stubborn stain, aren't you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だがこの我には無駄だと知れ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But know this is useless against me!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場と似たような様子で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Much like a battlefield scene,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるはランス城の廊下を掃除していた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru was cleaning the hallway of Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんだ、ランス。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's up, Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我がハタキを動かしているのが面白いか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Do you find it amusing that I'm moving my duster?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……危なっかしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... it's just dangerous.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に、腹が…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially your belly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「腹…………ああ。コレか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Belly... ah, this, huh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まったく、さっさと出てくればいいものを」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Really, you should just come out quickly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるはゆるりと、膨らんだ腹を撫でる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Teru gently strokes her swollen belly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんか……落ち着かん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Somehow... it makes me uneasy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てるさんちっこいから、余計に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially since Teru-san is small... even more so."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この程度でどうにかなるものか。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This won't affect me at all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利の嫡子だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I am the legitimate heir of Mouri."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはそうだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That may be true, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえば、名前はもう決めてるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, have you decided on a name yet?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「元就」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Motonari."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それ、親父の名前だろーが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's your father's name, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハゲマッチョになるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He'll become a bald macho man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさしく理想だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly my ideal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、そうなるように鍛えるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll train him to become that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「他の名前は必要ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No other name is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせ、当主になると同時に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because once he becomes head of the family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利元就の名は継がれる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will inherit the name Mouri Motonari."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ファザコンだなぁ、てるさん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're such a daddy's girl, Teru..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今さら何を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's that supposed to mean now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ところで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...By the way,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子でもその名前にするのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will you give that name even if it's a girl?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今更だな。JAPANでは、当主名は世襲だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's too late for that. In JAPAN, the family head's name is hereditary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの問題も……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no problem with that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、そういう連中はともかく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, leaving those people aside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいのか、赤んぼの女の子に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it really okay for a baby girl...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……考えてなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I hadn't thought about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、ふむふむ、なるほど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, hmm hmm, I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいＯＫ。順調ねー。もうめっちゃ順調。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, good. Things are going well. Really very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というか、生まれてきてもおかしくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, it wouldn't be strange if it was born already,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時期なんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく困った奴だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a troublesome one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重心が乱されてかなわん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's messing up my center of gravity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦ならば止めても無駄だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it's a battle, trying to stop it is pointless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我は母である前に毛利。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before being a mother, I am Mouri.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中のコレも赤子である前に毛利」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one inside me is Mouri before being a baby."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦場で生きられぬ毛利など、意味はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mouri that can't survive on the battlefield is meaningless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅ……万一が起きませんように……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I hope nothing happens..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気遣いは頂いておく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I appreciate your concern."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……それでも、赤子らしい所に身を置けば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... even so, if placed in a baby-like environment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しは出てくる気になると思ったが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it might prompt him to come out a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……我の方が耐えられなくなりそうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems I might be the one who can't endure it any longer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なまぬるい、この空気……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This lukewarm air..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「慣れろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Get used to it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我は貴様とは違うという事だ、徳川の。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That means I am different from you, Tokugawa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様の方が、我慢が利く……かな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps you have more patience than I do...?"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それはそうだが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That may be true, but...

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, have you decided on a name yet?

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Motonari."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それ、親父の名前だろーが。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That's your father's name, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハゲマッチョになるぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He'll become a bald macho man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まさしく理想だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly my ideal.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、そうなるように鍛えるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, I'll train him to become that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「他の名前は必要ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No other name is necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせ、当主になると同時に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because once he becomes head of the family,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 毛利元就の名は継がれる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He will inherit the name Mouri Motonari."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ファザコンだなぁ、てるさん……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You're such a daddy's girl, Teru..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今さら何を」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's that supposed to mean now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………ところで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...By the way,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女の子でもその名前にするのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Will you give that name even if it's a girl?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今更だな。JAPANでは、当主名は世襲だぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's too late for that. In JAPAN, the family head's name is hereditary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの問題も……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no problem with that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや、そういう連中はともかく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, leaving those people aside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいのか、赤んぼの女の子に……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it really okay for a baby girl...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……考えてなかった」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I hadn't thought about that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「んー、ふむふむ、なるほど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, hmm hmm, I see..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はいＯＫ。順調ねー。もうめっちゃ順調。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Okay, good. Things are going well. Really very well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というか、生まれてきてもおかしくない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, it wouldn't be strange if it was born already,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 時期なんだけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's about time..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まったく困った奴だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What a troublesome one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 重心が乱されてかなわん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's messing up my center of gravity."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦ならば止めても無駄だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If it's a battle, trying to stop it is pointless.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我は母である前に毛利。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Before being a mother, I am Mouri.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 中のコレも赤子である前に毛利」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This one inside me is Mouri before being a baby."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「戦場で生きられぬ毛利など、意味はない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mouri that can't survive on the battlefield is meaningless."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぅ……万一が起きませんように……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ugh... I hope nothing happens..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気遣いは頂いておく」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I appreciate your concern."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかし……それでも、赤子らしい所に身を置けば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However... even so, if placed in a baby-like environment,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しは出てくる気になると思ったが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I thought it might prompt him to come out a little."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……我の方が耐えられなくなりそうだな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...It seems I might be the one who can't endure it any longer.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なまぬるい、この空気……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This lukewarm air..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「慣れろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Get used to it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我は貴様とは違うという事だ、徳川の。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That means I am different from you, Tokugawa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴様の方が、我慢が利く……かな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Perhaps you have more patience than I do...?"
